links.*: The Lord of the Rings (film series)

wikitext.*:
'''Jerry VanderStelt''' is a fantasy and science fiction artist. The works of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] and [[C.S. Lewis]] have inspired his artwork. On license of [[New Line Cinema]] he has created many drawings of [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' (film series)]]. His art is produced by '''VanderStelt Studio''', a company he runs himself.<ref>{{webcite|author=Jerry VanderStelt|articleurl=http://www.vandersteltstudio.com/bio.htm|articlename=Artist Bio|dated=|website=vandersteltstudio.com|accessed=7 April 2012}}</ref>
